short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NEXT Recruit is a recruitment tool that helps you write better LinkedIn messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your next hire with AI generated recruitment prompts using ChatGPT. Just navigate to a user's LinkedIn page, upload a job description, and let our customizable app hire your next candidate
